name: SpookBooster
description:
You won a haunted mansion in a competition from the back of an energy drink can. Unfortunately, it's full of ghosts! Only one thing to do. You're here to kick ass and crunk energy drinks. And you'll never run out of energy drinks.

  • WASD to move!
  • Space to jump!
  • J to shoot!
  • K to chug an entire can of pure ghostly energy!

Made for the MACS 2023 Game Jam

Credits:

Design, Programming, and Art

i will bite raw coffee beans

Explosion Sprite:

32x32 Explosion by diamonddmgirl

Font:

Alagard by Hewitt Tsoi

Gun sound effects:

Based on Chaingun, pistol, rifle, shotgun shots by Michel Baridari used under CC 3.0

Other sound effects:
Based on RPG Sound Pack by artisticdude

Ingame music:

"Underground Army"

"Will" from 16 Bit Music Pack 1 by MrJoshuaMcLean used under CC BY-SA 4.0
